segments.text: I see the woman drying dishes by the sink, completely oblivious to the water overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring onto the floor, creating a huge puddle around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the boy standing on a stool, trying to reach the cookie jar on the upper cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable, like it's about to tip over any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing nearby, her hand outstretched, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think it's funny how the woman is so focused on drying that plate, she doesn't even notice the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside the window looks so peaceful, it's like a different world out there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what's going to happen when the woman finally notices the water or the kids.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching to reach those cookies, I hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl seems so patient, just waiting for her turn to get a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but laugh at the absurdity of this situation, it's like a comedy of errors.
segments.speaker: PAR
